testcase.name: Successful Login
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I fill in my username standard_user....................................passed And I fill in my password secret_sauce......................................passed And I click on the login button.............................................passed Then I'm logged in..........................................................passed And redirected to the product page..........................................passed

testcase.name: Successful Logout
testcase.system-out: Given I am correctly logged in with username standard_user and password secret_sauce.passed Given I am on the product page..............................................passed When I click on the hamburger menu in the nav. bar..........................passed Then I see a list of buttons................................................passed When I click on logout......................................................passed Then I am logged out of the application.....................................passed And redirected to the Home Screen the login screen..........................passed
